pages.title: Virginia Opossum
pages.text: The Virginia opossum ($(o)Didelphis virginiana$()), also known as the North American opossum, is the only opossum living north of Mexico, its range extending south into Central America.$(br2)It is the northernmost marsupial in the world.

pages.title: Virginia Opossum
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 6$(br2)Growth time: None Days
